questions.question_text: When tailoring the COBIT organization structure to organizational context and priorities, which of the following should be done NEXT after mapping organizational structures with specific responsibility or accountability?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
COBIT emphasizes a flexible approach to fit diverse organizational contexts. After mapping responsibilities, adapting roles and structures enables the organization to ensure that accountability aligns with its operational and strategic objectives. This customization supports the integration of COBIT's principles into the enterprise's governance and management systems.

References:
https://www.isaca.org/resources/news-and-trends/industry-news/2018/a-new-cobit-is-in-town-and-i-really-like-how-it-looks
https://www.isaca.org/resources/news-and-trends/industry-news/2019/cobit-design-factors

Selected Answer: B
B. Adapt the COBIT roles and organizational structures.

choices.A: Add two levels of involvement for consulted and informed.
choices.C: Revise the organizational hierarchy with job descriptions.
choices.B: Adapt the COBIT roles and organizational structures.

questions.question_text: What IT governance implementation approach should be utilized in order to achieve maximum enterprise benefits?
How can an enterprise determine whether expected outcomes from initiatives are being achieved?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Implement a monitoring system.

questions.question_text: Which of the following COBIT publications can be used to develop a roadmap for continuous governance improvement?

choices.A: COBIT 2019 Design Guide: Designing an Information and Technology Governance Solution
choices.B: COBIT 2019 Framework: Governance and Management Objectives
choices.C: COBIT 2019 Implementation Guide: Implementing and Optimizing an Information and Technology Governance Solution

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. COBIT 2019 Implementation Guide: Implementing and Optimizing an Information and Technology Governance Solution

This guide specifically addresses how to develop and execute a roadmap for improving IT governance continuously. It provides practical implementation guidance, including steps to tailor COBIT to organizational needs, manage initiatives, and align governance improvements with organizational priorities.

References:
https://www.isaca.org/resources/news-and-trends/industry-news/2019/designing-your-organizations-custom-cobit

Selected Answer: C
C. COBIT 2019 Implementation Guide: Implementing and Optimizing an Information and Technology Governance Solution
